summary.span: 包含 WPF 支援之每個屬性的 。

span.span: Contains a for each property that the WPF supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]隨附預先定義的屬性通常會收集的手寫筆和數位板的物件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ships with pre-defined objects for properties that are commonly collected by a stylus and a digitizer. 您可以使用這些內建屬性，來建立。You can use these built-in properties to create a . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立使用欄位。The following example demonstrates how to create a using the fields. [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

summary.span: 表示畫筆軸與 Tablet PC 介面之間的角度。

span.span: Represents the angle between the axis of the pen and the surface of the Tablet PC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值畫筆時平行的介面和 90，表面垂直畫筆時為 0。The value of is 0 when the pen is parallel to the surface and 90 when the pen is perpendicular to the surface. 當畫筆反轉的值是負的。The values are negative when the pen is inverted.

span.span: Represents the clockwise rotation of the cursor, through a full circular range around the z-axis.

summary.span: 表示數位板上接觸點的高度。

span.span: Represents the height of the contact point on the digitizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連絡點的高度取決於檢測所使用的型別。The height of the contact point depends on the type of instrument that is used. 值使用觸控時而有所不同。The value of can vary when Touch is used.

summary.span: 表示與 Tablet PC 介面垂直之畫筆筆尖的壓力。

span.span: Represents the pressure of the pen tip perpendicular to the Tablet PC surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty PacketStatus;
.field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty PacketStatus
Public Shared ReadOnly PacketStatus As StylusPointProperty
public: static initonly System::Windows::Input::StylusPointProperty ^ PacketStatus;

summary.span: 表示游標的目前狀態。

span.span: Represents the current status of the cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值欄位包含一或多個下列位元欄位中的旗標值。The value of the field contains one or more of the following flag values in a bit field. 您可以使用位元運算子來檢查這些值的狀態。Use bit operators to check the status of these values. - 資料指標接觸的繪圖介面 (值 = 1)。The cursor is touching the drawing surface (Value = 1). - 資料指標會被反轉。The cursor is inverted. 畫筆橡皮擦結尾，例如指向介面 (值 = 2)。For example, the eraser end of the pen is pointing toward the surface (Value = 2). - 不使用 (值 = 4)。Not used (Value = 4). - 按下鸃庢餂鈕 (值 = 8)。The barrel button is pressed (Value = 8).

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty PitchRotation;
.field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty PitchRotation
Public Shared ReadOnly PitchRotation As StylusPointProperty
public: static initonly System::Windows::Input::StylusPointProperty ^ PitchRotation;

summary.span: 表示筆尖是位於與寫入介面垂直的水平線之上還是之下。

span.span: Represents whether the tip is above or below a horizontal line that is perpendicular to the writing surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這需要三維數位板。This requires a three-dimensional digitizer. 值是正數，如果提示高於該線和負數，如果它低於該線。The value is positive if the tip is above the line and negative if it is below the line. 比方說，如果在保存您面前畫筆，撰寫虛數牆上的音高大約是正數，如果提示是從您延伸到牆上一行上面。For example, if you hold the pen in front of you and write on an imaginary wall, the pitch is positive if the tip is above a line extending from you to the wall.

span.span: Represents the clockwise rotation of the pen around its own axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這需要三維數位板。This requires a three-dimensional digitizer.

summary.span: 表示沿著 Tablet PC 介面平面的畫筆筆尖壓力。

span.span: Represents the pen tip pressure along the plane of the Tablet PC surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位代表壓力沿著 Tablet PC 介面的平面。The field represents pressure along the plane of the Tablet PC surface. 欄位代表垂直 Tablet PC 介面的平面不足的壓力。The field represents pressure perpendicular to the plane of the Tablet PC surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用檢測類型而定的連絡點的寬度。The width of the contact point depends on the type of instrument that is used. 值使用觸控時而有所不同。The value of can vary when touch is used.

summary.span: 表示當畫筆方向為水平時，畫筆偏向其水平軸左側或右側的角度。

span.span: Represents the angle of the pen to the left or right around the center of its horizontal axis when the pen is horizontal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這需要三維數位板。This requires a three-dimensional digitizer. 如果您在按住畫筆在虛數牆上的寫入，零繞表示畫筆牆面垂直。If you hold the pen in front of you and write on an imaginary wall, zero yaw indicates that the pen is perpendicular to the wall. 值為負數，如果左邊的垂直筆的提示且正數，如果秘訣是垂直方向的右側。The value is negative if the tip is to the left of perpendicular and positive if the tip is to the right of perpendicular.

.field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty YTiltOrientation
Public Shared ReadOnly YTiltOrientation As StylusPointProperty
public: static initonly System::Windows::Input::StylusPointProperty ^ YTiltOrientation;

summary.span: 表示 (x, z) 平面與畫筆及 X 軸平面之間的角度。

span.span: Represents the angle between the (x, z) plane and the pen and x-axis plane.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這適用於畫筆游標。This applies to a pen cursor. 描繪垂直畫筆時，值為 0。The value is 0 when the pen is perpendicular to the drawing surface. 畫筆向上或離開使用者時，這個值是正數。The value is positive when the pen is upward or away from the user.

summary.span: 表示 Z 座標或畫筆筆尖與 Tablet 介面之間的距離。

span.span: Represents the z-coordinate or distance of the pen tip from the tablet surface.
